item.description:
For your entertainment and dining pleasure- presenting Saturday night theatre, with optional dinner before curtain time! Choose theatre, dinner, or both!

Perfect Harmony

The Stoneham Theatre kicks off its new season with "Perfect Harmony!"
This beautifully restored theatre is located in Stoneham Center, easily accessed from both Rt. 95 (128) and Rt. 93.

They have reserved excellent orchestra seats for our group at a price of $25.00.

Contact Carole Dempsey at the Group Box Office to reserve your ticket. Payment can be made by phone with credit or debit card, and you can pick up your ticket at the will-call window just before showtime.
Call Carole Tues-Fri at 781-279-7885

Perfect Harmony
written and directed by Andrew Grosso
September 9 - October 3, 2010

About the show:

The Acafellas have won 18 a capella National Championships, but this year the Ladies in Red think it's their turn to shine. Perfect Harmony exposes the cut-throat competition of glee clubs and the even more cut-throat competition of high school. The show premiered to raves at the 2006 NY Fringe Festival.

Rated PG-13: contains mild profanity, irreverent humor, and excessive use of 80's pop songs.


http://stonehamtheatr....

AN OPTIONAL DINNER BEFORE THE SHOW WILL BE POSTED AS A SEPARATE MEETUP.

This meetup is also posted with: Meeting & Greeting in Southern NH & the Merrimack Valley, Northern Middlesex Singles, and The Boston Providence Single Parents Group.
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at our seats so folks can enjoy the pre-show choral group

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Do you like "GLEE" & 80's music? Theatre (& optional dinner) "Perfect Harmony"
